reviews.title: Best Wireless Headphones Under $200
reviews.description: A comprehensive guide to finding the perfect wireless headphones that deliver exceptional sound quality without breaking the bank.
reviews.excerpt: Discover our top picks for wireless headphones that offer premium features and excellent sound quality while staying under $200.
reviews.quickTake: After testing dozens of wireless headphones, we've found that you can get premium features like active noise cancellation, great battery life, and excellent sound quality without spending a fortune.

products.title: Best Overall: Example Headphones Pro
products.description: These headphones offer the perfect balance of sound quality, comfort, and features. With 30-hour battery life, active noise cancellation, and premium audio drivers, they're an exceptional value.

products.title: Best Budget Pick: Example Wireless 2
products.description: Don't let the price fool you - these headphones deliver impressive sound quality and comfort at an incredibly affordable price point.
